basic.description: General introduction to discretization techniques for solving engineering problems. Derivation of element and global force-displacement equations employing both the variational and direct stiffness methods. Discussion of the criteria for selecting various approximating functions, available finite elements, substructure analysis and procedures for rapid design changes. (CIVL-439 plus additional material). Learning materials $30.00. Three term-hours; lectures
basic.subject: CIVL
basic.title: Finite Elements
